title: 1887 Allen & Ginter N28 Non-baseball complete set
author: Archive

posts.post_title: 1887 Allen & Ginter N28 Non-baseball complete set
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Al C.risafulli
I am selling my complete set of N28 Allen & Ginter non-baseball cards.

With the exception of one card, the entire set is graded, mostly by PSA but a few SGC and two Global.  The one ungraded card is the John Sullivan, which PSA deemed to be trimmed.

Grade breakdown is as follows:

Joe Acton (Wrestler) PSA 4
Yank Adams (Billiards) PSA 5
Theo Bauer (Wrestler) PSA 6
Wm. Beach (Oarsman) PSA 4
Young Bibby (Wrestler) SGC 5.5
A.H. Bogardus (Rifle Shooter) PSA 6
Geo. Bubear (Oarsman) PSA 4
Jimmy Carney (Pugilist) SGC 5
W.F. Carver (Rifle Shooter) SGC 5 (MK) - tiny little checkmark in pencil next to Carver's name on the back
Jimmy Carroll (Pugilist) PSA 3
Buffalo Bill Cody (Rifle Shooter) PSA 2
Maurice Daly (Billiard Player) PSA 6
Jack Dempsey (Pugilist) PSA 6
Jos. Dion (Billiard Player) PSA 5
Albert Frey (Pool Player) PSA 6
Jacob Gaudaur (Oarsman) PSA 5
Albert Hamm (Oarsman) PSA 5
Ed Hanlan (Oarsman) GAI 4
Geo. Hosmer (Oarsman) PSA 5
Jake Kilrain (Pugilist) SGC 5
Joe Lannon (Pugilist) PSA 6
J.L. Malone (Pool Player) PSA 2
Jack McAuliffe (Pugilist) PSA 7
John McKay (Oarsman) PSA 2
JH McLaughlin (Wrestler) PSA 6
John McMahon (Wrestler) PSA 2
Charlie Mitchell (Pugilist) PSA 4
Wm. Muldoon (Wrestler) PSA 7
Annie Oakley (Rifle Shooter) PSA 3
Wallace Ross (Oarsman) PSA 2
J. Schaefer (Billard Player) PSA 5
WM. Sexton (Billiard Player) PSA 5
Geo. Slosson (Billiard Player) PSA 6
Jem Smith (Pugilist) PSA 7
Matsada Sorakichi (Wrestler) SGC 6
John Sullivan (Pugilist) - Authentic, not holdered
John Teemer (Oarsman) PSA 2
EA Trickett (Oarsman) PSA 5
M. Vignaux (Billiard Player) GAI 6
Ike Weir (Pugilist) PSA 2

This is a decent, midgrade set with some overgrades.  My asking price is $5300, and the first to say "I'll take it" gets 'em.  Emails to alcris@comcast.net take precedence over posts.  Insured shipping is on me.  Scans will be made available this evening.

-Al

posts.post_title: 1887 Allen & Ginter N28 Non-baseball complete set
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Al C.risafulli
Scans can be found here, if you're so inclined:  [url]http://www.swingbattaswing.com/page5/files/page5-1000-full.html[/url]

Just keep hitting "next" to scroll through the entire set.

-Al
